thread.title: Dell Curry drills deep 3-pointer at GSW game
thread.title_full: Dell Curry drills deep 3-pointer at GSW game

author: USA TODAY
title: Dell Curry drills deep 3-pointer at GSW game
text:
Dell Curry drills deep 3-pointer at GSW game The Curry family can make their 3-point shots. Post to Facebook Dell Curry drills deep 3-pointer at GSW game The Curry family can make their 3-point shots.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/steph-curry-dell-curry-3-pointer-deep-shot-family-warriors-nba/   Join the Nation's Conversation   Dell Curry drills deep 3-pointer at GSW game Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 11:30   
Team Curry guard Stephen Curry of the Golden State Warriors (30, left), legend Dell Curry (center), and guard Sue Bird of the Seattle Storm (10, right) smile during the 2015 NBA All Star Shooting Stars competition at Barclays Center. (Photo: Bob Donnan-USA TODAY Sports) 
Steph Curry's dad, Dell Curry, became one of the highlights of the night on Wednesday. 
Steph tossed a basketball toward Dell, who played in the NBA for 16 years. Without skipping a beat - and in a suit - Dell grabbed the ball, took a step toward the basket and let it fly. Steph... to DELL... for THREE!! pic.twitter.com/1W9lroCF4O â€” CSN Warriors News (@CSNWarriors) February 2, 2017 
After it banked in, both father and son laughed, while Dell shrugged, and Steph pumped his fist. 
Dell shot 40.2 percent from deep overall in his career. So far, Steph is shooting 44 percent from beyond the arc. Plus, Seth Curry, the other Curry currently in the league who hasn't launched as many shots as Steph or Dell (yet), is shooting 43.2 percent from the 3-point line. Not bad. 
If you'd like to see Dell and Steph face off, last year the two played H.O.R.S.E. for a GQ video that you can watch here . Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/steph-curry-dell-curry-3-pointer-deep-shot-family-warriors-nba/ Most Popular
